name: day-1
description: ​ For this kata you need to create a function that takes an array of triangles. Each triangle is represented as an array e.g. `[10, 12, 22]` where the three numbers are the sides of the triangle. The function should return the count of triangles that are valid. ​ To be a valid triangle, the sum of any two sides must be larger than the remaining side ​
